body:
New Gamemode idea
2 teams:Red and Blue
Medieval themed maps
You can attack or defend. First to take the most gold is victorious
This is like CTW And instead you need to obtain the most gold blocks And bring it back to your base. 30m limit.  You can kill players or take whole blocks from enemies.  You can only hold 1 gold block at a time. If an enemy destroys the defense you can repair it. If you get a gold block you need to throw it in a hopper. This GM can be won by people who want to get kills or people who like to get monuments on nebula

Scoreboard: On the scoreboard it goes
Red
GoldB:-#-
Blue
GoldB:-#-

Equipment: Leather dyed armor
StoneSword
Bow Infinity
DPick UB3Eff4 
Stack of Stone, Glass, Wood
 

If you kill someone you get 1 gold nugget
 Max Build Height:4025 team limits
Can't place blocks on the side of the map

title: [U]GoldRush - New GM Idea

replies.body:
Question: Should we have TNT or not?

Make it infinite gold and you need to bring back the most gold in 1 hour?
 Every kill = 1 gold ingot?
replies.body_tagged:
Question: Should we have TNT or not?

Make it infinite gold and you need to bring back the most gold in 1 hour?
 Every kill = 1 gold ingot?

replies.body:
+1
And I think TnT would ruin it.
replies.body_tagged:
+1
And I think TnT would ruin it.

replies.body:
I agree with infinite gold + time limit, but 1 hour is way too long. Make it 10 minutes for build time/grace period and have 15 or 20 minutes for the actual fighting. Alternatively you could have different servers host different time limits.

And yes, I think TNT would ruin it. Overall, +1 to the idea.
replies.body_tagged:
I agree with infinite gold + time limit, but 1 hour is way too long. Make it 10 minutes for build time/grace period and have 15 or 20 minutes for the actual fighting. Alternatively you could have different servers host different time limits.

And yes, I think TNT would ruin it. Overall, +1 to the idea.

replies.body: You could have TNT but with no block damage. I like the idea!
replies.body_tagged: You could have TNT but with no block damage. I like the idea!

replies.body: +1. The game idea is similar to other games but this one is more creative. 1 thing though, take away the TNT
replies.body_tagged: +1. The game idea is similar to other games but this one is more creative. 1 thing though, take away the TNT

replies.body: Great idea! +1 But.. no TnT pls.
replies.body_tagged: Great idea! +1 But.. no TnT pls.

replies.body: id like this more if there was no prep time and set up. more like nebula instead of walls

It's a good idea.
But I feel like it's missing something...
+0.5

replies.body: Sounds great +1 Maybe for the /giveblock thing you can use /brick or /glass instead, plus a cooldown for getting the blocks.

replies.body: Bumping to show the "updated" version of this Idea(1.5)
replies.body_tagged: Bumping to show the "updated" version of this Idea(1.5)

replies.body: I really like the idea. I love the idea of the prep time, but if you have a teamgriefer on your team you lost, well I might think about a worsecase xD The /giveblock command is also useful for rushers. But I have a little suggestion, change the name. I like the name, but there is already a game with the name on xisumavoids server. Just to stop any confusings. Overall nice idea +1
